content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in pistoia on 11032010 the text does not provide information about the parties involved the case lasted for 13 years from 1997 to 2010 according to article 275 of the code of civil procedure the court made a final decision the court assigned specific real estate properties to two parties and one party was ordered to pay a balance of eur 1930991 plus legal interest to the other party the court also determined the costs of the proceedings and ordered both parties to share the costs equally the court dissolved a community hereditary property and deducted the grandchildrens share due to debts owed by one party the court also ordered the payment of an occupation allowance and the repayment of a loan various claims and actions were dismissed by the court the court determined the division of the estate and assigned lots to the parties accordingly the courts decision was made on january 20 2009
